channel.title: Solving ODEs on Modelling and Scientific Computing
channel.description: Recent content in Solving ODEs on Modelling and Scientific Computing

item.title: ODE Solvers - AM exercise
item.description: The intentions behind this exercise are: To give you a clear goal to meet To give you a chance to revise or learn a few things. Specifically: The abstract base class pattern; Unit testing with unittest; Ordinary differential equation solver implementations. A nice feature of this assignment is that you are provided with a testing infrastructure which gives an implicit specification of the code you are required to write.
